title: League client download Pause and resume option?
body:
I recently downloaded the new client and am currently downloading the game.
I hate that it doesnt have the option to resume the download.
Next time you update the client or something can we have the option to pause and resume the download.

replies.body: No current pause option, the patcher would have to rescan your game files for corruption before proceeding again.  Your best bet is to let it finish up, but your suggestion is a good one.  It would definitely help a lot!  I recommend posting your feedback to the[ client boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)so our client devs can check into it.
